    • setUpShip

      public boolean setUpShip(int length, String startPoint, String endPoint, String direction, String boat)
      Places down the ship
      Parameters:
      boat - the number that represents the boat as a string
      direction - string that shows if the boat is vertical or horizontal
      endPoint - the point where the boat stops or the closest to it
      length - the length of the boat
      startPoint - the point where the boat is supposed to start
      Returns:
      if the ship setup was successful
